channel.title: Artists :: Pelota Documentation
channel.description: Documentation for creating and designing assets for Pelota.

item.title: Designing Tennis Players
item.description: Prerequisites Install Blender Download Blender from blender.org Install the latest stable version (4.0 or newer recommended) Launch Blender and complete the initial setup Setup MPFB 1. Install MPFB Extension Open Blender Go to Edit > Preferences > Extensions Search for “MPFB” Click the result and select Install Enable the extension after installation
